host_type.super_flex: Up to 30 days before check-in: 100% of the rental amount is refunded. After this period and up to 2 days before, the amount refunded is 50%. After this period payment is in full.
host_type.flex: Up to 30 days before check-in: 100% of the rental amount is refunded. After this period and up to 7 days before, the amount refunded is 50%. After this period payment is in full.
host_type.moderate: Up to 60 days before check-in: 100% of the rental amount is refunded. After this period and up to 15 days before, the amount refunded is 50%. After this period payment is in full.
host_type.rigid: Up to 90 days before check-in: 100% of the rental amount is refunded. After that period and up to 30 days before, the amount refunded is 50%. After this period payment is in full.
